title: Welcome
text:
Policy leader and researcher with proven track record securing $1M+ in grant funding, launching statewide data initiatives, and driving 20%+ annual revenue growth. Expertise combining data-driven research with strategic leadership to advance affordable housing solutions across Virginia. Skilled at building cross-sector partnerships, managing complex stakeholder relationships, and translating technical analysis into actionable policy. Previous career in archaeological research and cultural resource management from 2012 to 2018.


[Add your introduction here - a brief paragraph about who you are, what you do, and your interests]
